hero.title: Mofani wa Ditirelo tsa Kago le Kaonafatso
hero.subtitle: Ga re dire fela ka bontle; re dira ka go tlhama motheo o o sa khongoloseng, o o itshegang le o o bonahalang mo teng le kwa ntle.

footer.description: Re a le amohela mo Kanguya Builders, mohlodi wa gago wa ikanyego wa ditirelo tsa kago le kaonafatso tsa maemo a godimo. Ka boiphihlelo jwa dingwaga di le 14+ mo intasetering ya kago, re ikgantsha thata ka go neelana ka ditharollo tse di se nang sepe.
footer.copyright: Â© 2024 Kanguya Builders. Ditshwanelo tsotlhe di sireletsegile. | Ditirelo Tsa Setsebi tsa Kago le Kaonafatso

services.title: Ditirelo Tsa Rona Tsa Kago
services.subtitle: Ditharollo tse feletseng tsa kago le kaonafatso ka dingwaga tse 14+ tsa boiphihlelo
services.tilingDesc: Kago ya setsebi ya ditheilara mo mafatsheng, mading le dipindu
services.plasteringDesc: Ditirelo tsa setsebi tsa go phahla ka teng le ka ntle
services.brickworkDesc: Kago ya dithene ya maemo a a kwa godimo ya sebopego le bontle
services.paintingDesc: Ditirelo tsa setsebi tsa go penta ka teng le ka ntle ka pheletso e e phethagetseng
services.pavingDesc: Go aga ditsela tsa dikoloi le ditsela tsa go tsamaya ka didirisiwa tse di nnang
services.plumbingDesc: Kago e e feletseng ya metsi le ditirelo tsa tokafatso
services.carpentryDesc: Ditiro tsa setso tsa logong le ditharollo tsa boenjiniere
services.maintenanceDesc: Ditirelo tse di tswelang pele tsa tlhokomelo le tokafatso
